# package_name

Description. 
The package small_calc is used to:

	- Sum
	- Subtraction
	- Multiplication
	- Division

## Installation

Use the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install small_calc

```bash
pip install small_calc
```

## Usage

```python
from small_calc import small_calc
small_calc.my_function()
```
